name: Fishtank
description:
Welcome to Fishtank! You are a goldfish in a glass tank. Shell your way though twenty levels in this top-down shooter inspired by the Wii Play Tanks mini-game. This is my first game, so hope you enjoy it!

Artwork by the talented Emma Rutherford, instagram at:

https://instagram.com/emma.ruth.designs?igshid=18xjuse613a2y

Made using the Love2D game engine.
https://love2d.org/

Controls:
Move  -  WASD
Shoot  -  Left Mouse
Pause  -  Escape
